Class BinaryRatingPacker

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lenskit.data.packed.BinaryRatingPacker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable

    @NotThreadSafe
public class BinaryRatingPacker
extends Object
implements Closeable

    Creates rating pack files for the BinaryRatingDAO.
